SELECT
u.carnet as carnet_usuario, u.documento as doc_usuario, u.correo as correo_usuario, u.nombres as nombres_usuario, u.apellidos as apellidos_usuario, u.passwd, u.ultimoingreso, u.bloqueado,
c.id as id_cargo, c.nombre as nombre_cargo, c.descripcion as des_cargo
FROM BR_USUARIO as u left join BR_CARGO as c on u.id_cargo=c.id
WHERE u.carnet=#{carnet_usuario}

SELECT
u.carnet as carnet_usuario, u.documento as doc_usuario, u.correo as correo_usuario, u.nombres as nombres_usuario, u.apellidos as apellidos_usuario, u.passwd, u.ultimoingreso, u.bloqueado,
c.id as id_cargo, c.nombre as nombre_cargo, c.descripcion as des_cargo
FROM BR_USUARIO as u left join BR_CARGO as c on u.id_cargo=c.id
WHERE u.correo=#{correo}

SELECT
u.carnet as carnet_usuario, u.documento as doc_usuario, u.correo as correo_usuario, u.nombres as nombres_usuario, u.apellidos as apellidos_usuario, u.passwd, u.ultimoingreso, u.bloqueado,
c.id as id_cargo, c.nombre as nombre_cargo, c.descripcion as des_cargo
FROM BR_USUARIO as u left join BR_CARGO as c on u.id_cargo=c.id
ORDER BY u.carnet
